<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Raumya (The Evil Prince)](/Deities.aspx?ID=195)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 132 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Vudrani Gods
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=17)

**Edicts** Improve yourself with music and literature, take what you want, seek power above others

**Anathema** Abuse a loyal subject, harm or kill a non-combatant

**Follower Alignments**
LE, NG, N, NE

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12)

**Favored Weapon** [Trident](/Weapons.aspx?ID=45)

**Domains** [Confidence](/Domains.aspx?ID=4), [Knowledge](/Domains.aspx?ID=17), [Might](/Domains.aspx?ID=20), [Wealth](/Domains.aspx?ID=36)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[True Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=345)

- **2nd**
[Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164)

- **4th**
[Weapon Storm](/Spells.aspx?ID=373)

</column>
name: Raumya (The Evil Prince)
